creator: 7 Weeks
descriptionHtml:
Championing positive habits, one day at a time.

7 Weeks is the simplest method to develop a new habit or break a bad habit. Based on "the X effect" method of completing goals, 7 Weeks creates a compounding strategy of focusing on one day of your habit/goal at a time, building streaks that become more & more difficult to break.

Every day that you complete successfully, simply mark the day as complete! Each day you complete gets you one step closer to not just making or breaking a new habit or completing a goal, but it increases your motivation, willpower and discipline.

Scientists believe the sweet spot for developing or breaking a habit is around 7 weeks. Once you have completed 49 days straight with little failure, you can be sure you'll have developed a positive habit, broken a bad habit or completed a goal. Not performing your new habit will feel strange. Slipping back into old ways will be unnatural.

With custom alarms, flexible habit types, home screen widgets, the most beautiful habit tracking interface & multiple customization options for each habit, 7 Weeks is the #1 app to get you on track to making your habits and goals.

7 Weeks Gold brings even more power to you!

For only the price of one cup of coffee, you get:

- The ability to take goal tracking beyond 7 weeks.
- Ability to track more than 2 habits at a time.
- Two beautiful & fully functional home screen widgets.
- Unlimited custom reminders for each habit with custom repeats, time & messages.
- Quick access to checking off habits from home screen widgets & reminders.

& much, much more coming soon!

And if you share the app on Facebook or Twitter, you can get 50% off the upgrade!

I also love hearing from my users! Send ideas and feedback to feedback@7weeksapp.com. We read all emails :)

So what are you waiting for? - can you make it 7 Weeks?
descriptionShort: Championing positive habits, one day at a time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
7 Weeks - 3.2.1:

Tons of bug fixes!

- Alarms now are much more reliable and have snooze/complete features directly from them.
- Widgets no longer go blank after a short period of time.
- Performance improvements and other small features.

Coming soon:

- Android Wear compatibility
- Tablet compatibility
- Backup!

descriptionShort: Championing positive habits, one day at a time.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We're back! 7 Weeks has been re-written from scratch!

With a beautiful new interface & improved features, 7 Weeks is the simplest & most beautiful habit tracker available.

Updates:
- Brand new UI.
- Fixed alarm issues & added features like enabling & disabling, reliable repeats.
- Removed small features: habit reasons, habit descriptions & general alarms.
- Habit day notes now free!
& much more, enjoy :)

Have feedback, find a bug, or want to say hey? Email feedback@7weeksapp.com.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for all the feedback, I'm working to make 7 Weeks even better than before!

- New habit cards layout - complete habits from the main screen.
- Fix end date setting.
- Minor bugs & performance improvements throughout.
